Text: Thank you so much for this!  Much appreciated BOZX

@BOZX 
The audio is out of sync. It is close to seven seconds ahead. How do I fix this?
You use VLC and the J and K buttons.

@Bolle420
Thanks. I did try that. It works up to two seconds only on VLC. Am I the only one with this problem?
I don't like cricket, no, oh no....

The Audio is out of sync
Using MKVMerge remux it...Delay the Audio by  7110ms and it is fixed. or use VLC (j,k)
Cheers BOZX..thanks :D
